name: df-ltxr
body: |- wceq(clt, cun(copab(s0, s1, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wbr(cv(s0), cltrr, cv(s1)))), cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr))))
comment: Define 'less than' on the set of extended reals. Definition 12-3.1 of [Gleason] p. 173. Note that in our postulates for complex numbers, ` <RR ` is primitive and not necessarily a relation on ` RR ` . (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
